name: Hula
description: A Strawberry and Coconut inhale with Guava and a touch of Coconut on the exhale that will make you want to put on a grass skirt and dance the night away on a beach in Hawaii.
author: eyemakepizza

reviews.text: My GF wanted a tropical-esque vape and I decided on this one. Personally, I love it - but the GF test is the real factor here. She absolutely loved it luckily, and claims its one of the best mixes I've made to date. I keep a pretty nice size bottle of this around for her at this point now. It's a very nice tropical vape and all around very refreshing.
Tasty Really nice, but I've experienced better recipes by eyemakepizza.  Victim of your own success.

Really tasty tropical recipe here. But to me the coconut overpowers the other fruits a bit. And the coconut also has a milky texture that I'd rather not have in this. Regardless I still find it very tasty.

Really tasty steeped for 14days before trying it, and the strawberry still stuck around. The coconut came through well. The guava tastes like a red fruit to me so i think it just blended and became one with the strawberry. Excellent job

I thought I wasn’t much of a fan of tropical fruit vapes until I tried this- this is one of my favourite recipes now. It’s so perfectly balanced. The strawberries hang out in the background but sweeten up the whole profile while also subduing some of the weirdness I personally get from the guava. I love the FA coconut and sweet coconut combo. I might steal that idea one day! I haven’t tried loads of tropical recipes but the ones I have tried have been more candy-ish. This is like a nice refreshing fruit juice. I did add a little bit of sweetener before I had vaped it for the first time. Next time I’m going to try leaving that out to see if that makes the fruit more authentic tasting. It’s so yummy. Thanks for sharing this recipe.
Been vaping this for about an hour, it is a very very nice tropical refreshing vape.  It's perfectly balanced, naturally sweet, not that candy sweetness.  Really well done.
Really enjoying this juice. Nice and smooth coconut and guava

I'm finishing up a batch of this about a month old at this point. I've really been digging the juice. It brings a very smooth, balanced tropical delight right into your taster no matter how cold and snowed in it is outside. To me the strawberry takes a bit of a backseat for the guava and coconut and the marshmallow seems to smooth it all together in a very pleasant way. Hula scratches my itch for straight fruit juice and being such a delightful SNV I'll be keeping this recipe in rotation to mix up whenever I need something on the fly or am itching for some tropical goodness. I would definitely recommend this if you're a fan of tropical fruits or need a break from the heavier vapes like bakery/tobacco flavors.

This recipe is an awesome, and incredibly well-balanced blend of fruits that you should mix up if you're into tropical luxury. I tried this before the FA Marshmallow was added to smooth out any harshness, so your version will probably be even better. The combination of guava and coconut makes a wonderfully smooth and creamy base, and throwing in some sweet strawberry magic is never a bad choice. This will be in my SNV rotation for a very long time.
